title: ‘Better Than Expected’: Jonas Vingegaard Stays Within Striking Distance after Tour de France Time Trial Test
content:
Matteo Jorgenson roars to 7th while Van Aert loses nearly 2 minutes in warning ahead of Olympic Games: 'I hope for better legs during the Games.'

Read the full article at ‘Better Than Expected’: Jonas Vingegaard Stays Within Striking Distance after Tour de France Time Trial Test on Velo.
author: ahood
